AutoProcess.name: Auto process at end of turn?
AutoProcess.hint: If set to true, the persistent damage will be rolled after the token's turn. Otherwise, you must run the macro 'Process Persistent Damage'.

AutoRecover.name: Auto D20 Recovery Check?
AutoRecover.hint: Should the D20 flat check for removal be done as part of the message, or separately?

AutoResolve.name: Auto resolve?
AutoResolve.hint: Automatically remove upon successful flat check?

HideRolls.name: Hide Persistent Damage Rolls?
HideRolls.hint: Should persistent rolls be always shown or always hidden? If hidden, players cannot see their own damage results.
